newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's Gardenia applies for bourse listing.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's Gardenia applies for bourse listing.

text.p: Hungarian curtain factory Gardenia Csipkefuggonygyar Rt submitted its request to list its registered ordinary shares on the Budapest Stock Exchange (BSE), the BSE said in a statement.
Gardenia lodged its request on February 17, it said, adding that the shares would be introduced into the listed "A" category.
Gardenia said last week it planned a combined capital market transaction which would contain a sale of own shares and a capital increase and would be followed by a bourse listing.

The capital increase would raise Gardenia's issued share capital by between 600 million and one billion forints from the current one billion. The capital increase aims at financing the company's expansion plans.
